what happened
now Jimenez is totally dependent on his

treat and stabilize the patients the

Jimenez his case has morphed into a

sued Maarten memorial for the costs of
his care he alleges that Jimenez was
essentially kidnapped by the hospital
without his consent and there was little
evidence to show that he would receive

case appears to be the first to test
both the legality of medical
repatriations and a hospital's liability
when they send patients to their
homelands Gaspar's lawyer the hospital's
actions were not proper this case is the
